content: अमा {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [न मा-का] Measureless. {%--<ab>ind.</ab>%} <ab>Ved.</ab> {@--1@} At home, in the house; कामश्चरताममाभूत् <ls>Rv. 2. 38. 6.</ls> {@--2@} In this world, here below (इहलोके). {@--3@} With, near, close to; अमैवासां तद्भवति <ls>Śat. Br.</ls> {@--4@} Together with, in conjunction or company with, as in अमात्य, अमावास्या <ab>q. v.</ab>; अमाकृ to draw near, have near oneself. {%--<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} The day of the new moon, the day of the conjunction of the sun and moon; अमायां तु सदा सोम अषेधीः प्रतिपद्यते <ls>Vyāsa.</ls> {@--2@} The sixteenth digit of the moon. {@--3@} The fifteenth digit also. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} The soul.
